description:
The course module NICF-Software Analysis and Design Practicum is a NICF course designed to assess the student’s competencies in designing software architecture for real-life projects. This assessment requires the student to either (1) work on a company internship project or (2) submit an experience report of company projects that the student is involved not more than 2 years from the submission. ISS instructors and supervisors from external
organizations will be involved to assess the student deliverables.
title: Software Analysis and Design Project
